official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for elderly people on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Revises the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 by authorizing reduced rate transportation for elderly people on a space-available basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for elderly people on a space-available basis.
